items.sentence: Do you really expect Tom to get here on time?
Do you really think Tom is younger than Mary?
I\'ve seen Tom play peek-a-boo with his baby.
If I had wanted it, I would\'ve asked for it.
Don\'t you think you should be getting ready?
I don\'t suppose you\'d consider helping Tom.
I assume you\'re referring to Tom\'s problem.
If you could come tomorrow, that\'d be great.
Have you already written in your diary today?
Don\'t you think you\'ve had enough to drink?
Tom knew Mary could speak French fairly well.
Tom isn\'t the type of man who\'d betray you.
Who was your favorite teacher in high school?
Tom used a pasta machine to make fresh pasta.
Tom used to be a better chess player than me.
Tom celebrated his birthday with his friends.
What kind of birds do they have in Australia?
You\'re the only one I can count on for help.
Are we going to be able to finish this today?
In what kinds of situations would you use it?
